practice_phrases: It's a house
Es una casa
It's a war
Es una guerra
It's a blue house
Es una casa azul
It's a town near Italy
Es un pueblo cerca de Italia
It's a house where she fought during the war
Es una casa donde ella combatió durante la guerra
It's a town next to the place I told you
Es un pueblo al lado del lugar que te dije
It's a blue house where I want to find some things to buy
Es una casa azul donde quiero encontrar algunas cosas para comprar
It's a big town near Italy where my grandfather fought during the war
Es un pueblo grande cerca de Italia donde mi abuelo combatió durante la guerra
It's a place where she told me let me find what I want in the blue house
Es un lugar donde ella me dijo déjame encontrar lo que quiero en la casa azul
It's a big world.
Es un mundo grande.
